message.content:
The most likely category for this paper would be "Books" (5) because it discusses the work of Bruce Block, who is an author of the book "The Visual Story." 

The second likely category would be "Movies & TV" (14) because the paper mentions the films and television shows that Bruce Block has worked on.

The third likely category would be "Arts, Crafts & Sewing" (11) because the paper discusses storytelling and the creative process in film and animation.

The fourth likely category would be "Electronics" (13) because the paper mentions stereoscopic photography and its use in films.

The fifth likely category would be "Toys & Games" (7) because the paper mentions Philip Captain 3D McNally's interest in stereoscopic photography, which could be considered a hobby or game-like activity.

Title: 3D Storytelling: How Stereoscopic 3D Works and How to Use It
Content: Bruce Block has worked in a creative capacity on dozens of feature films, television shows, commercials, and animated films. His credits includeSomething's Gotta Give,What Women Want,America's Sweethearts,How Do You Know,The Parent Trap,As Good As It Gets,andStuart Little. He is an adjunct Professor at USC’s School of Cinematic Arts and is the author of the bookThe Visual Story.Philip Captain 3D McNally has been a stereoscopic photography enthusiast for over twenty years and currently ser...
